DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect add-on sildenafil bosentan monotherapy patient Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension . Patients bosentan monotherapy follow every 6 month assess meet pre-defined treatment goal . If patient fails achieve treatment goal fail maintain , sildenafil add exist bosentan monotherapy . Patients assess 6 month start combination therapy change 6MWT , Borg dyspnea scale , WHO functional class , quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Addition Sildenafil Bosentan Therapy Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
